entry.title: $2100 // AFFORDABLE 2 BEDROOMS! UNBEATABLE location! NO FEE! BUSHWICK!
entry.content:
Affordable 2BR/1bath apartment in Bushwick, prime location!

This 2 bedroom apartment features spacious living room and queen sized bedrooms, on opposite sides of the apartment. HEAT AND HOT WATER INCLUDED!

You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Archie's, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse.

Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only a 5 minute walk to the M trains.

-- NO BROKERS FEE -


Credit/income check!

co-signers are welcome! :)
